name: D-PO: Gun Incremental
description:
D-PO is an extremely early prototype for an incremental game that has guns.
There's Swords too! WARNING: This game is a prototype and therefore has no save feature yet! Once this becomes something more fully fledged, more features will be added.

Features so far include:

  • 7 weapons to choose from, 4 guns and 3 swords.
  • Can buy ammunition for certain guns
  • Shoot/Slash targets to earn cash
  • Convert cash into upgrade tokens to buy upgrades
  • 5 upgrades to help get more cash and upgrade tokens faster

UPGRADES:

  1. Golden Bullets- increase the amount of cash that can be earned by destroying targets
  2. More Targets- more targets spawn at once
  3. Faster Targets- targets spawn faster
  4. Increased Upgrade Tokens- can convert cash into more upgrade tokens
  5. 2X multiplier-  doubles the cash earned 

What is planned to be added:

  • Better shop UI
  • Music and more sound effects
  • More types of unique guns and swords
  • Bosses
  • More types of currency
  • Save feature
  • Animations for targets being destroyed
  • Rework on many mechanics e.g. Ammo usage, Targets having 
  • A way to idle the game

Remember this is an extremely barebones prototype, and therefore they may be bugs. If any are discovered, uploading a comment about the issue is the best way for any problems to be addressed.
